privacy-policy.subtitle: At SVLU, we are committed to protecting your privacy. When using our platform, we collect personal information such as your name, email address, and course activity. This policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal data. We encourage younger users to discuss these practices with a parent or guardian. For more information, please refer to the SVLU Privacy Statement.

privacy-policy.title: Personal Data We Collect
privacy-policy.subtitle: To provide the best possible learning experience, SVLU collects personal data, including your name, email address, login details, and information about the courses you engage with. This data also includes device details, course progress, and any content you share (e.g., assignments, feedback). We may collect data from third parties, such as a parent or school if they create an account for you. While some data is optional, withholding required data may limit access to certain features or courses.

privacy-policy.title: How We Use Personal Data
privacy-policy.subtitle:
SVLU uses personal data to: 
- Offer and support courses and services 
- Improve and personalize your learning experience 
- Recommend relevant courses 
- Analyze and optimize platform performance 
We do not use your personal content or private information for targeted advertising.

privacy-policy.title: Cookie Management
privacy-policy.subtitle: SVLU uses cookies to enhance your user experience. Cookies help store preferences, enable sign-ins, provide relevant course recommendations, and analyze platform performance. You can manage cookie settings through your browser. By continuing to use our platform, you consent to the use of cookies.

refund-policy.subtitle: At SVLU, we strive to offer the best online learning experience. If you're not completely satisfied with your purchase, we are happy to assist with a refund.

refund-policy.title: Refunds
refund-policy.subtitle:
You have 7 days from the date of purchase to request a refund for any course, bundle, or software. To be eligible for a refund, the following conditions apply: 
- The refund request must be made within 7 days of purchase. 
- The course or product must not have been fully accessed or completed.
After the 7-day period, refunds are not available. Please contact our support team if you need assistance with a refund request.
